newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Central bank dollar/rouble rates 5751/5793 FXSU.
newsitem.headline: Central bank dollar/rouble rates 5751/5793 FXSU.

text.p: The Russian Central Bank said it had set 5751/5793 roubles per dollar as its bid and offer rates for its operations on the currency market on Friday.
The official rate for Saturday will be 5772.
On Thursday the bid/offer rates were 5750/5792, with the official dollar rate 5771 from Friday.
The Central Bank announces daily bid/offer dollar/rouble rates for its currency operations. The midpoint of these rates is the official dollar/rouble rate for the following day.
